abstract: Paul Sullivan Wealth Matters column notes insights on in-home child care offered by Tammy Gold book Secrets of The Nanny Whisperer: A Practical Guide For Finding and Achieving the Gold Standard of Care for Your Child; observes that Gold suggests that many parents do not go into process of hiring nanny with clear goals in mind.
lead_paragraph: One of the common mistakes made by those looking for in-home child care: failing to carefully consider the type of nanny who will best meet their needs.
snippet: One of the common mistakes made by those looking for in-home child care: failing to carefully consider the type of nanny who will best meet their needs.

keywords.value: Secrets of The Nanny Whisperer: A Practical Guide For Finding and Achieving the Gold Standard of Care for Your Child (Book)
keywords.name: creative_works

headline.main: Finding a Nanny Who Fits With Your Family
headline.print_headline: How to Find a Nanny Who Fits With Your Family
